name: Eyedress Game
description:
How To Play

Start Game - Enter

Quit Game - Escape

Walk/Ride - T

Push off Board - Left Mouse

Brake - Right Mouse

Camera - Mouse

Ollie Charge - Spacebar (held)

Ollie - Spacebar (released)

Kickflip - R (in air)

Heelflip - F (in air)

Pop Shove-It - F + W (in air)

Varial Heel - R + W (in air)
